LuaScript:
--[[ Lua code. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ --]]

--[[ The onLoad event is called after the game save finishes loading. --]]
function onLoad()
    --[[ print('onLoad!') --]]
    buttonContainer = getObjectFromGUID('0f1ba4')
    buttonContainer.createButton(
        {
            click_function = 'setup',
            function_owner = Global,
            label          = 'Setup',
            position       = {
                0, 0.01, 1.5
    --             -- 0, 0, 0
                -- gameSheetsBag.getPosition().x,
                -- gameSheetsBag.getPosition().y,
                -- gameSheetsBag.getPosition().z
            },
            scale = {
                2,
                2,
                2
            },
            width          = 400,
            height         = 120
        }
    )
end

--[[ The onUpdate event is called once per frame. --]]
function onUpdate()
    --[[ print('onUpdate loop!') --]]
end

function setup()
    -- Place Discovery cards
    buttonContainer.removeButton(#buttonContainer.getButtons() - 3)
    for _, obj in pairs(getObjects()) do
        if obj.type == 'Deck' then
            obj.shuffle()
            Wait.time(
                function()
                    obj.takeObject(
                        {
                            position = {
                                obj.getPosition().x,
                                obj.getPosition().y + 3,
                                obj.getPosition().z
                            },
                            smooth = true,
                            callback_function = function(takenObject)
                                if takenObject.type == 'Card' and takenObject.is_face_down then
                                    Wait.time(
                                        function()
                                            takenObject.flip()
                                        end,
                                        0.8
                                    )
                                end
                                obj.destruct()
                            end
                        }
                    )
                end,
                0.6
            )
            -- obj.destruct()
        end
    end

    -- Deal Game sheets
    local gameSheetsBag = getObjectFromGUID('ff8268')
    -- local gameSheetsBag = nil
    -- for _, obj in pairs(getObjects()) do
    --     -- log(obj.name)
    --     -- log(obj.type)
    --     if obj.type == 'Infinite_Bag' then -- and obj.getName() == 'Game Sheets' then
    --         gameSheetsBag = obj
    --         log("found bag")
    --         log(gameSheetsBag.getGUID())
    --         break
    --     end
    -- end
    for _, playerColorName in pairs(getSeatedPlayers()) do
        for _, hand in ipairs(Hands.getHands()) do
            local data = hand.getData()
            for k, v in pairs(data) do
                if k == "ColorDiffuse" then
                    local handZoneColor = cloneWithAlpha1(v)
                    local playerColor = Color.fromString(playerColorName)
                    if handZoneColor == playerColor then
                        local newPosition = nil
                        if hand.getRotation().y == 0 then
                            newPosition = {
                                hand.getPosition().x,
                                hand.getPosition().y,
                                hand.getPosition().z + 8.36
                            }
                        end
                        if hand.getRotation().y == 90 then
                            newPosition = {
                                hand.getPosition().x + 8.36,
                                hand.getPosition().y,
                                hand.getPosition().z
                            }
                        end
                        if hand.getRotation().y == 180 then
                            newPosition = {
                                hand.getPosition().x,
                                hand.getPosition().y,
                                hand.getPosition().z - 8.36
                            }
                        end
                        if hand.getRotation().y == 270 then
                            newPosition = {
                                hand.getPosition().x - 8.36,
                                hand.getPosition().y,
                                hand.getPosition().z
                            }
                        end
                        gameSheetsBag.takeObject(
                            {
                                position = newPosition,
                                rotation = {
                                    0, 180, 0
                                },
                                smooth = true,
                                callback_function = function(takenObject)
                                    Wait.time(
                                        function()
                                            takenObject.setLock(true)
                                        end,
                                        3
                                    )
                                end
                            }
                        )
                        break
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

 -- alpha 1 is needed since equals() contemplated it
 function cloneWithAlpha1(color)
    local copy = color:copy()
    copy:set(copy.r, copy.g, copy.b, 1)
    return copy
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--[[Coded by Exile]]

function onLoad()
    createUserInterface()
end

function createUserInterface()
    self.createButton({
        click_function = "onRollClick",
        tooltip = "Roll Dice",
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0.1,.75},
        height = 100,
        width = 500,
        font_size = 100,
        color = TRANSPARENT,
        label = 'Roll Dice'
    })

    self.createButton({
        click_function = "onRollClick",
        tooltip = "Roll Dice",
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,-0.1,.75},
        rotation = {0,0,180},
        height = 100,
        width = 500,
        font_size = 100,
        color = TRANSPARENT,
        label = 'Roll Dice'
    })

    self.addContextMenuItem("Roll",
        function()
            onRollClick()
        end, false)
end

function onRollClick()
    pos = self.getPosition()
    pos.y = pos.y + 1

    objectSize = self.getBoundsNormalized().size

    zoneSpawn = {position = pos
         , scale = {objectSize.x, 1, objectSize.z }
         , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
         , callback = 'zoneCallback'
         , callback_owner = self
         , rotation = self.getRotation()
         , color = TRANSPARENT}
     spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
    local diceObjects = {}
    local diceCount = false

    for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
      if(o.type == "Dice") then
          table.insert(diceObjects, {guid = o.getGUID(), value = 0})
          o.roll()
          diceCount = true
      end
    --do something with the objects
    end

    --waits for the dice to finish rolling
    if(diceCount) then
        Wait.time(function() sortDice(diceObjects) end, 3)
    end

    zone.destruct() --destroy the zone when you're done with it, to avoid clutter.
end

--sorts the dice by number
function sortDice(diceGuids)
    --prints guid
    for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        local dice = getObjectFromGUID(o.guid)
        o.value =  dice.getValue()
    end

    local sorted_table = table.sort(diceGuids, function(a,b) return a.value < b.value end)

    arrangeDice(sorted_table)
    --prints sorting
    --[[for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        print(o.guid .. '-' .. o.value)
    end]]

    --getObjectFromGUID(string)
end

function arrangeDice(diceGuids)
    local xOffset = -1.25 * self.getScale().x
    local yOffset = 1.75 * self.getScale().y
    local diceOffset = 1.25
    local lastValue = nil

    local xDice = 0
    local yDice = 0

    local rollerPos = self.getPosition()

    for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        local dice = getObjectFromGUID(o.guid)

        if(lastValue != nil) then
            if(lastValue < o.value) then
                xDice = xDice + diceOffset
                yDice = 0
            elseif(lastValue == o.value) then
                yDice = yDice - diceOffset
            end
        end

        dice.setPositionSmooth({(rollerPos.x + xOffset + xDice), (rollerPos.y + 1), (rollerPos.z + yOffset + yDice) }, false, false)

        lastValue = o.value
    end
end
